suite.name: SmokeTest

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Focus on element and take screenshot
Set Focus To Element
kw.doc: Sets focus to element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

suite.doc: This file is the collection all the Smoke test cases Teminal command to run the test suite : robot -d OptionalTest <BonfiyQATestRobot folder path>/TestSuites/SmokeTest.robot Output screenshots are stored in '/Screenshots/Smoke' folder in the project Log & Reports are generated in '/result' folder in the project

suite.name: SanityTest

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the given ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Test Case Verify Login With Valid Credentials

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

arguments.arg: error=User Name Text Box is not visible

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is enabled.

arguments.arg: error=User Name Text Box is not enabled

kw.name: Clear Element Text
kw.doc: Clears the value of text entry element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is visible.

arguments.arg: error=Password Text Box is not visible

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until element ``locator`` is enabled.

arguments.arg: error=Password Text Box is not enabled

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.doc: Takes screenshot of the current page and embeds it into log file.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.doc: Verifies that current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.doc: Navigates the active browser instance to the provided ``url``.
